creator: marms@sandia.gov
text:
On the Apache2 download page, the URL for the MD5 file for
"apache_2.0.54-win32-x86-no_ssl.msi" returns a 404 (Not found).

http://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/binaries/win32/apache_2.0.54-win32-x86-no_ssl.msi.md5

Sure enough, checking out the directory, the file is not there.

We need the MD5 file to have a measure of certainty of the validity of the disto
file. Thanks.

- Mike Arms

This has been fixed on the primary mirror, and should show up on the public site
within 4 hours.

Here is the correct MD5:
3b54dc11982c49fab12a1206c4f47fe9 *apache_2.0.54-win32-x86-no_ssl.msi
creator: chip@force-elite.com
